name: Cool Curves
description:
Get to the bottom!

Controls:

A / D - jet left/right

Arrow Left / Right - Rotate player counter clockwise / clockwise

Double tap 'r' - return to spawn

Double tap 'L' - reload scene

Toggle 't' - very slow time toggle

Space Bar - Activate balloon, unlocks at SCORE: 1000

I made this in about 6 days for Weekly Game Jam 204: Downhill. The main challenges were balancing the physics of the player character, and writing the scoring code. If I had more time to improve it, I would improve the terrain and level layout. I would also improve the music. It could use animations for the player character too. It could incorporate powerups/collectibles, and more platformer elements.

Thanks for viewing/playing!
